channel.title: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.
channel.description:
Chris Roberts (Wing Commander) introduces and gives details on his next game -- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=VhsgiliheP0]Star Citizen.[/url]
The detailing is really impressive.

item.title: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Pyro:

That’s a deliberate concession to aesthetics, though it’s partly justified by the fact that all the spacecraft can go into atmosphere. Quite a few of the ships also have intakes, allegedly for bussard scoops.

The game actually does have Newtonian flight physics; the level of simulation even goes down to individual thrusters.

The dogfighting component of the game is out right now, if anyone wasn’t aware, though it’s an insanely buggy and incomplete alpha build.

I’ve been playing it quite a bit.

Though honestly, it’s not nearly as buggy as I had expected. I have yet to run into any major bugs. I can’t wait to get into multiplayer. Hopefully soon. (They’re at 20,000. I’m #118620)

Read full topic
item.source: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.

Ailerons in space at 7:00

That’s a deliberate concession to aesthetics, though it’s partly justified by the fact that all the spacecraft can go into atmosphere. Quite a few of the ships also have intakes, allegedly for bussard scoops.

The game actually does have Newtonian flight physics; the level of simulation even goes down to individual thrusters.

The dogfighting component of the game is out right now, if anyone wasn’t aware, though it’s an insanely buggy and incomplete alpha build.

item.title: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
Hmm… well, now I feel like reinstalling Darkstar One.

That first person hangar clip with the low FOV was nasty to watch even in the small YouTube player.

Ailerons in space at 7:00

Keresh:

Rise! Rise from the dead!

this thread

item.title: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
Oh, that’s right, it was zero wing that had a terrible translation, not wing commander. My bad.

Also I’m only half-trolling here. I am fairly clueless, but I could easily find out these things with google. I ask because Xalener always has such entertaining reactions.

Read full topic
item.source: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.

item.title: Chris Roberts introduces his next game -- Star Citizen.
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
We all know he lives under a rock. He didn’t know Halo was an xbox exclusive, hell, he didn’t even know who Cliffy B was till a few weeks ago.

Read full topic

Not sure if you’re trolling or just been living under a rock.

item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
This looks amazing. I want it now but I don’t really want to donate . It looks like it’ll be the most detailed thing to be released on Cryengine, I wonder if it surpasses even Crysis 3. I kind of doubt it but it does look really good.
